# Build artifacts
bin/
obj/

# Visual Studio files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Cache files
.vs/
.idea/
*.cache

# Logs
*.log

# Configuration files
appsettings.*.json
*.config

# Backup and temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp
*.swm

# Resharper
_ReSharper*/
*.DotSettings.user

# Rider
.idea/
.idea/**

# macOS
.DS_Store

# Windows
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# NUnit
TestResult.xml
*.TestResults/

# Coverage results
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Debug and release
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.ilk
*.idb
*.tlog
*.log

# Package management
*.nupkg
packages/

# Generated files
*.designer.cs
*.g.cs
*.g.i.cs
*.sln.ide
*.lock.json

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.DotSettings.user

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Python (if Python tools are used)
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]

# NuGet
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# Azure
.localhistory/
*.publishsettings

# Others
*.sln.ide
*.swp
*.tmp
